v0.1.0.description:
A new version of my Nonogram / Picross Archipelago integration.
With:
- A name-change! Because there is another nonogram implementation for Archipelago called "Nonopelagram", go check that out too!
- New gimmick: even and odd numbers (enable in the yaml).
- Custom grid sizes: see yaml.
- Progress is now saved (last checkpoint/check).
- You now only get one clue at a time.

Play this on the new website: https://nonograhmm.netlify.app/

⚠️ I've changed many things, so please treat this as unstable and/or untested.

To do:
- Add solo games to this version.
v0.1.0.title: Nonograhmm for AP 0.1.0

v0.2.0.description:
# [Version 0.2.1 is out!]
https://github.com/spineraks-org/ArchipelagoNonogram/releases/latest

## Version 0.2.0!
This version aims to make the experience a lot easier and hopefully more fun!
You can play here, both solo and Archipelago: https://nonograhmm.netlify.app/
Solo is great to check out how it works very quickly!
- Pretty UI! Seems to work great on both desktop and mobile.
- New clue gimmicks! 3/5 means it's either 3 or 5. 6+ means it's 6 or higher. You can also combine gimmicks!
- **500 solo puzzles!** All sorts of grid sizes and gimmicks!
- The game will show you if you mark a square out of logic or incorrectly. This should clear up a lot of confusion, while not giving the solution away!
- In Archipelago your progress is saved automatically.
- Probably needs a little bit of testing but...: multiple people can log into the same puzzle!
v0.2.0.title: Nonograhmm for AP 0.2.0

v0.2.1.description:
### Version 0.2.1!
- Added option to disable clues!
- Tested coop and it probably works now!

v0.2.2.description:
## Version 0.2.2!
- *Much* faster generation, which allows for 20x20 grids!
- Changed Ω to O in the yaml for odd numbers.
- Added "random" option to clue types list, adding it will add each clue type with 50/50 chance.
- Universal Tracker support just because we can.
- <sup><sub> Moved options to `Options.py` to fix a Pickle error on the webhost or something <sub><sup>
## Version 0.2.1!
- Added option to disable clues!
- Tested coop and it probably works now!
## Version 0.2.0!
This version aims to make the experience a lot easier and hopefully more fun!
You can play here, both solo and Archipelago: https://nonograhmm.netlify.app/
Solo is great to check out how it works very quickly!
- Pretty UI! Seems to work great on both desktop and mobile.
- New clue gimmicks! 3/5 means it's either 3 or 5. 6+ means it's 6 or higher. You can also combine gimmicks!
- **500 solo puzzles!** All sorts of grid sizes and gimmicks!
- The game will show you if you mark a square out of logic or incorrectly. This should clear up a lot of confusion, while not giving the solution away!
- In Archipelago your progress is saved automatically.
- Probably needs a little bit of testing but...: multiple people can log into the same puzzle!
v0.2.2.title: Nonograhmm for AP 0.2.2

v0.2.3.description:
## Version 0.2.3

- This one gens crazy fast thanks to @Eijebong <3
- You can now go up to 25x25 grids. Decide for yourself if you want this :)
v0.2.3.title: Nonograhmm for AP 0.2.3

v0.3.0.description:
# Version 0.3.0!
https://nonograhmm.netlify.app/
## Changes:
### Apworld
- Fixed unknown location ids
- The 'all' options in `clue_types` now actually works :) 
- You can now make every marking a check. If you do, you can add extra clues. Fillers are also added and you can choose how many are in your own game
- By default you only get one clue at a time, and the next one is displayed only after you've did all you could. I've added an option that displays *all* clues you have received. In my opinion this often removes the beautiful logic of the game, but it's there if you really want to...
- Option groups in the yaml which hopefully looks organized
- Filler items don't do anything, but who can get the longest filler item??
### Game
- I've added AP log messages for items you send and receive.
- There are now solo puzzles up to 25x25!
v0.3.0.title: Nonograhmm for AP 0.3.0

v0.3.1.description:
# Version 0.3.1!
https://nonograhmm.netlify.app/
## Changes 0.3.0 -> 0.3.1 (no yaml changes):
- Fixed logic (logic assumes one more clue than you actually have...)
## Changes 0.2.x -> 0.3.0
### Apworld
- Fixed unknown location ids
- The 'all' options in `clue_types` now actually works :) 
- You can now make every marking a check. If you do, you can add extra clues. Fillers are also added and you can choose how many are in your own game
- By default you only get one clue at a time, and the next one is displayed only after you've did all you could. I've added an option that displays *all* clues you have received. In my opinion this often removes the beautiful logic of the game, but it's there if you really want to...
- Option groups in the yaml which hopefully looks organized
- Filler items don't do anything, but who can get the longest filler item??
### Game
- I've added AP log messages for items you send and receive.
- There are now solo puzzles up to 25x25!
v0.3.1.title: Nonograhmm for AP 0.3.1
